foreignObject.div:
<% for (const partial of [...partials]) { %> <%- await include(`partials/${partial}.ejs`) %> <% } %>
<% if (base.metadata) { %>
<% if (account === "user") { %> These metrics <%= !computed.token.scopes.includes("repo") ? "do not include all" : "include" %> private contributions<% if ((config.timezone?.name)&&(!config.timezone?.error)) { %>, timezone <%= config.timezone.name %><% } %> <% } %> Last updated <%= meta.generated %> with lowlighter/metrics@<%= meta.version %>
<% } %>
